footer.letter: Schrijf je in voor onze nieuwsbrief

0.title: Expertise
0.text: ASRR heeft een divers team van getalenteerde professionals. Gezamenlijk vormen we een team met een brede kennis in alles wat met IT te maken heeft. We hebben specialisten in websites, apps, databases, hardware, desktop aplpicaties, BI, Data analytics en veel meer!

1.title: Effectiviteit
1.text: Met onze microservices hoeven we niet elke keer het wiel opnieuw uit te vinden bij elke opdracht. Dit zorgt ervoor dat we ons kunnen focussen op het maatwerk, en daarmee de arbeidsuren relatief laag kunnen houden. We hebben een scala aan over-engineered componenten die we kunnen gebruiken om uw volgende project een robuuste basis te geven.

2.title: Elasticiteit
2.text: ASRR is een jong, dynamisch bedrijf dat zich aanpast op de klant. Door onze robuuste basis kunnen we maatwerk leveren dat naadloos aansluit op uw huidige systeem of werkproces, terwijl de applicatie nog steeds stabiel en schaalbaar blijft.

landing.title: Innovative Software Development
landing.text: Verantwoordelijk voor het bouwen van next-level software - snel en efficient.

form.story:
ASRR denkt pro-actief mee in de projecten en komt met goede en efficiënte oplossingen.
Ze begeleiden het project vakkundig, zijn heel flexibel en kunnen snel schakelen indien nodig.
Het is erg plezierig om met ze samen te werken!
form.name: FORM Architecture & Engineering B.V.

esp.story: Het is een erg jong, professioneel en dynamisch bedrijf met een flat management structuur, dit zorgt voor een vlotte communicatie zowel intern als met de klanten, waardoor er veel aandacht en zorg is voor de klant. Ik heb erg goede ervaringen opgedaan met ASRR. Een echte aanrader als je op zoek bent naar een professionele partner die met je meedenkt en waar de klant op nummer 1 staat!
esp.name: ESP Consultancy B.V.

teams.title: Schaalbare IT-teams
teams.text: With current technology, an IT project usually takes the hard work and expertise of multiple developers. Not every company can afford this, and even if they can it's hard to create an efficient team. This is where ASRR delivers full-stack scalable IT teams that can seamlessly integrate with your current process.

data-analytics.title: Data Analytics | BI
data-analytics.text: Analysing data correctly can save any company from excess costs and inefficiency. Using our BI analytics on one of your existing or a new database, ASRR will provide insights into key aspects of your data.

consultancy.title: IT Consultancy
consultancy.text: Not sure what you need? ASRR can send an expert to analyse your company processes and propose a solution and fitting advice. ASRR can then provide the required developing skills.

preview.title: IT Teams As A Service
preview.text: ASRR delivers tailored advice from an expert in the subject for anything IT related, be it websites, applications, servers, AI/machine learning and much more. We can lead projects from the ground up, or adapt existing ones to fit your current needs. These solutions can then be carried out perfectly by our development team.
preview.landingText: Tailored advice from an expert in the field

preview.title: Custom Built Hardware
preview.text: If cloud is not what you need, we can also provide you with custom built servers, with far superior power to cost ratios. They can be used as strong workstations, remote desktop environments or even to host your API's on a kubernetes cluster.

servers.title: Servers | Hardware
servers.text: Slow and old systems can cause serious hinder in both security and efficiency. That's why we build our servers from scratch, selecting the right parts for the job at hand. Using this we can create remote desktop environments, data storage servers and machines optimized for heavy rendering.

title.text: De klant is koning(in) bij ASRR

landing.title: The power of a supercomputer on your own laptop
landing.text: An ultra secure and robust work environment for a complete team, improving the workflow and efficiency.

introduction.title: The Problem
introduction.text: Due to security limitations in their IT infrastructure, a specialized team in NWO needed a secure server to work on. The main requirements: 2FA, powerful computing and reliability.

bullets.value: Users would either use their own (slow) computer to handle and download secure company files when working remotely. Their user experience was inconsistent and there was no good way to communicate with the rest of the team.
Create a powerful central server, accessible to the whole team, with a deeply connected chat interface allowing for smooth teamwork.
128 gigs of ram, a 64 core cpu, a custom web-app for 2FA login and a office 365/teams organization set up from scratch.

result.title: What We Did
result.text: First off, we built a powerful server from scratch. Using the newest technologies, we were able to offer a server twice as capable as the competition for about half the price. Secondly, we built a back-end system that could manage the user passwords securely. This back-end system resets the password every hour or so and communicates this with the secure 2FA server. This server is then connected to our custom front end to allow for a seemless login to the remote desktop environment.

conclusion.title: Conclusion
conclusion.text: We provided a specialized team with the hardware, software and tips/tricks to allow for the best internal teamwork possible.

landing.title: Reinventing the housing industry
landing.text:
A robust and new way of creating a safe online web portal
for companies and just text to put here.

introduction.title: The Problem
introduction.text: HES International is one of Europe's largest independent bulk handling companies. One of their projects, a large scale steel tank came to our attention due to one of the planners.

bullets.value: The initial dataset containing all the information about each steel part in this project was based on an excel file. This is a risk in data security and makes updating the dataset a hassle. The amount of data in this excel sheet also made it hard to manage such a big set of data securely.
Create an application that moves the responsibility to the workers that are on the workfloor, while creating deeper insights for management.
A custom Excel parser, a SQL DB, a Spring Boot Java Application, a ReactJS front end and a PowerBI Dashboard for Business analygics

result.title: What We Did
result.text: First off, we parsed the Excel sheet, containing over 30k rows, using a Spring Boot Java application and stored it in one of our databses. This makes it possible to back-up frequently, and manage such a big dataset with ease. We then wrote various API calls that can manipulate the data. This then was linked with mobile/desktop web-application, where workers on the ground can check-in the progress of each steel part. This then all is sent to the database, where we use data analytics to create business insights for management.

conclusion.title: Conclusion
conclusion.text: By converting the old data solution to a more elegant one, we achieved two main things. For one, the data is stored more securely while allowing more than one person to edit it. Secondly, it allows the workers in the steel workshops to directly sign off on steel parts, creating a more up to date viewing of the total status of the project. Thirdly, we created deep meaningful insights for management, showing KPI's, planned vs actuals and much more, which wasn't possible before.

landing.title: Reinventing the housing industry
landing.text:
A robust and new way of creating a safe online web portal
for companies and just text to put here.

introduction.title: The Problem
introduction.text: We live in a digital age, with a website being our digital advertising board. However, there is much to say for the way we present ourselves online. A client of ours recognized the added wow factor with a progressive web application opposed to a classic wordpress website.

bullets.value: Automate the configuration of houses using code, automatically upload exports to the cloud and open up requests for new houses to third parties.

• Complex interface with the existing program
  • Spring Boot Rest API hosted in kubernetes
  • Front-end Web App in ReactJS
  • A custom server
  • Cloud storage

result.title: What We Did
result.text:
FORM uses complex BIM models to combine smart parametric designs with a structured way of working to create the 
3D models needed to build a house. This is a perfect example of something that can be automated.
The program FORM uses to engineer and model houses is called Autodesk Revit. Revit can be a bit unreliable at times,
 which posed a threat to ensuring we can go from a manual process to a fully automated cloud version.
We wrote a program that plugs into the existing application, enabling us to imitate user interactions with code. 
This allows us to automate complex actions flawlessly. 
Using the program, we create an output within Revit, for example a PDF with the building plans.
 This pdf is then uploaded to the cloud, and its location is passed to the central server.

conclusion.title: Conclusion
conclusion.text:
In short, we were able to adapt to the current process by writing code that integrates with the used programs. 
We then pushed it all to the next level by using enterprise grade methods to ensure reliability,
 speed and a good overall user experience. 
To put this into numbers, this can save hundreds of euros per house, making FORM’s Automation a cutting-edge competitor 
to big time firms while delivering consistent and reliable outputs.

introduction.title: The Problem
introduction.text:
One of our oldest clients, FORM, has hired ASRR and its developers for years to provide for their IT needs. 
Together with FORM we think about how we can realize the vision they
 have had for nearly a decade on how to revolutionize the housing industry

bullets.key:
The old process
(in a generic BIM/Architecture firm)
bullets.value: An architect manually changes chosen options for a new house for every house in a block, then generates every export separately and has to manage the huge amount of files involved.
Automate the configuration of houses using code, automatically upload exports to the cloud and open up requests for new houses to third parties.

• Complex interface with the existing program
  • Spring Boot Rest API hosted in kubernetes
  • Front-end Web App in ReactJS
  • A custom server
  • Cloud storage

result.title: What We Did
result.text:
FORM uses complex BIM models to combine smart parametric designs with a structured way of working to create the 
3D models needed to build a house. This is a perfect example of something that can be automated.
The program FORM uses to engineer and model houses is called Autodesk Revit. Revit can be a bit unreliable at times,
 which posed a threat to ensuring we can go from a manual process to a fully automated cloud version.
We wrote a program that plugs into the existing application, enabling us to imitate user interactions with code. 
This allows us to automate complex actions flawlessly. 
Using the program, we create an output within Revit, for example a PDF with the building plans.
 This pdf is then uploaded to the cloud, and its location is passed to the central server.

conclusion.title: Conclusion
conclusion.text:
In short, we were able to adapt to the current process by writing code that integrates with the used programs. 
We then pushed it all to the next level by using enterprise grade methods to ensure reliability,
 speed and a good overall user experience. 
To put this into numbers, this can save hundreds of euros per house, making FORM’s Automation a cutting-edge competitor 
to big time firms while delivering consistent and reliable outputs.
